members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
The Settings class manages Module Settings
Typically your settings control would be used to manage settings for your module. There are two types of settings, ModuleSettings, and TabModuleSettings.
ModuleSettings apply to all "copies" of a module on a site, no matter which page the module is on.
TabModuleSettings apply only to the current module on the current page, if you copy that module to another page the settings are not transferred.
If you happen to save both TabModuleSettings and ModuleSettings, TabModuleSettings overrides ModuleSettings.
Below we have some examples of how to access these settings but you will need to uncomment to use.
Because the control inherits from RIStore_ReportsSettingsBase you have access to any custom properties defined there, as well as properties from DNN such as PortalId, ModuleId, TabId, UserId and many more.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

member.name: P:My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: T:View
member.summary:
The View class displays the content
Typically your view control would be used to display content or functionality in your module.
View may be the only control you have in your project depending on the complexity of your module
Because the control inherits from RIStore_ReportsModuleBase you have access to any custom properties defined there, as well as properties from DNN such as PortalId, ModuleId, TabId, UserId and many more.

member.name: P:My.MyWebExtension.Computer
member.summary: Returns information about the host computer.

member.name: P:My.MyWebExtension.User
member.summary: Returns information for the current Web user.

member.name: T:My.MyWebExtension
member.summary: Module used to define the properties that are available in the My Namespace for Web projects.
